The lights cut out suddenly
Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
The mannequin on the floor springs up as the man touches it
A mannequin suddenly crashes through the window
The man opens a door, and a cackling mannequin jumps out at him from inside
The mirror suddenly smashes by itself
The curtain suddenly flies up by itself
There is a sudden cut to a creepy mannequin sitting on a chair with a loud sound cue
The mannequin opens its arms and springs forward towards the camera
The killer steps in front of Molly from the side accompanied by a sound cue
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
